title: 98/246/EC: Commission Decision of 19 March 1998 concerning the importation of meat products from Mexico and amending Decision 97/222/EC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 19 March 1998 concerning the importation of meat products from Mexico and amending Decision 97/222/EC (Text with EEA relevance) (98/246/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In part II of the Annex to Decision 97/222/EC, the following line is inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO code:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
